data.text: Ichihungo cha pfighate pfilihela hamila, ichikemighwe Ichihungo che Ipasaka chikala chahabehi.
Na ipfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wang'ali wobama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu, lekeni wang'ali wowapfuka iwanu.
Kuya Setani kamwingila Yuda yakemighwe Isikarioti, yumwe wa wala iwanang'ina kumi na weli.
Naye kaghenda kwa ipfilongotsi we inambiko ne iwakulu wa iwanu iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu, kalonga nawo pfatsodaha kumhunduka Yesu.
Nawo wadeng'elela na watoghola kumwing'a sendi.
Yuda katoghola na kandusa kubama uleghelo wa ukumhunduka Yesu ichipindi kuduhu kingili lye iwanu.
Litsuwa tsalipfika lye Ichihungo cha Pfighate ipfilihela hamila. Pfipfila likala litsuwa lya kukomighwa kwe iwang'olo we Ichihungo che Ipasaka.
Apfo Yesu kawatuma Petiri na Yohane, kawalongela, “Mghende mkatutengele ichijo ili tuje Ipasaka.”
Nawo wamghutsa, “Kobama tukakutengele kwani?”
Kawedika, “Baho hamkwingila mne ghumji, mtsetingana ne immale yaghalile libigha lya ghamatsi. Mmuwinze mbaka mne ing'anda yatsakwingila.
Na mtsomlongela yane ing'anda, ‘Imlangulitsi koghutsa, chilikwani chiheleto che iwahenza, ndiye Ipasaka hamwe ne iwanang'ina wangu?’
Naye katsowalangusa chiheleto chikulu cha uchanya, ichikwighwe ghoya. Namwe mtenge ichijo amo.”
Waghenda wachipfika chila ichinu ka Yesu pfawalongele, nawo watenga ichijo cha Ipasaka.
Isaa haipfikile, Yesu kawasola iwatumighwa wake kakala nawo mchijo.
Kawalongela, “Nosulukila kuja ichijo chino che Ipasaka na mwemwe ng'ana nidununzike!
Nowalongela ghendo, sitsakuja keli bae mbaka Pasaka haitsolawila mne Undewa we Imulungu.”
Yesu kasola ichikombe che dipfai, kalonga, “Mighede ghwe Imulungu.” Kuya kawalongela, “Mchisole mwose mchisole.
Nowalongela kulawa sambi sitsoinwa bae idipfai ino mbaka Undewa we Imulungu utse.”
Kuya kasola chighate, kalonga, “Mighede Imulungu.” Kachibena, kaweng'a, kalonga, “Aluno lukuli lwangu lwamwing'ighwe mwemwe. Mtende pfino kwa kung'umbuka nene.”
Pfipfila, hawamalitse kuja ichijo cha nemihe, kaweng'a ichikombe kalonga, “Achi ichikombe cha lilaghano lya sambi lye Imulungu ilili mne idamu yangu, iimwitikilani mwemwe.
Lekeni ghumoko ghwa ayula yatsonihunduka ghwa hamwe na nene mmetsa!
Imwana we Imunu katsakufa ka pfailamlighwe, lekeni katsoghaya ng'ani imunu yula iyomhunduka!”
Wandusa kwighutsa iwenyegho, yuhi mna wawo yatsotenda ichinu acho.
Pfipfila wandusa kwihisanya yuhi mna wawo yatsakuwa mkulu kubita wose.
Yesu kawalongela, “Iwandewa wa iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae wowatawala iwanu kwe ingupfu, na wala wane ukulu mna wawo wokemighwa ‘Sale tse iwanu.’
Lekeni kuna mwemwe si pfipfo bae. Yali mkulu na yawe ka mdodo kubita wose, na chilongotsi yawe ka imunu iyotumikila.
Kwaapfila yuhi yali mkulu? Yula iyokala mmetsa, au yula iyakwika ichijo? Ambe yula iyokala mmetsa? Lekeni nene namghati mwenu ka imunu iyosang'ana.”
“Namwe mkala na nene mne ukughetsighwa kwangu.
Na nene nomwing'ani undewa, ka apfila aba wangu pfangahile nene.
Mdahe ukuja ne ukunwa mmetsa mwangu mne undewa wangu, na kukala mne ipfighoda pfa undewa na kughahigha ghamakabila kumi na meli gha Isiraeli.”
Yesu kalonga, “Simoni, Simoni, ukale meso! Setani tsakabama kuwabeta mwemwe ka uhunga.
Lekeni nikulombela ghweghwe Simoni, ukutoghola kwako kuleke kuhunguka, naghwe hautsombuyila keli uwapfile iwandughu tsako.”
Petiri kamlongela, “Imtwatsa, nene nitoghola kughenda na ghweghwe mchifungo na hata ukukomighwa.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Nokulongela Petiri, leloli jogholo ng'ana yeke ghweghwe kutsonibela mala ndatu, ka ng'unimanyile bae!”
Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa, “Pfii hala haniwatumile aku mwahela ghumfuko au mkoba au pfilatu, tsamuhungukighwa na chinu?” Walonga, “Bae! Ng'atuhungukighwe na chinu bae.”
Kawalongela, “Lekeni sambi yane ghumfuko aghusole, na yane mkoba pfipfila aghusole. Naye yalihela lipanga autse lighwanda lyake ne aghule limwe.
Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka aghala igholonga. ‘Naye katsopetighwa ne iwanu wehile’ ghotimila. Nowalongela, hagho ghose ighandikighwe kwaajili ya nene ghobamighwa ghatimile.”
Iwanang'ina walonga, “Mtwatsa, lola, hano hana mimaghe mili.”
Yesu kaghenda kune Chidunda cha Mitseituni ka pfatsowele, na wanang'ina wake wamuwinza.
Hawapfikile ako, kawalongela, “Mlombe mleke kwingila mne ukughetsighwa.”
Kuya kawaleka, kaghenda utali wa imunu kudaha ukwasa libwe. Katowa ghamaghoti, kalomba,
“Ghwe Aba, ung'abama uchilapfe ichikombe chino kuna nene. Lekeni si ka pfanibama nene bae, lekeni ka pfubama ghweghwe.”
Baho malaika kamlawila, kamwing'a ingupfu.
Naye kwaapfila pfakalile mne usungu, tsakalomba ng'ani. Lijasho lyake tsalikala ka ghamadondwe gha idamu gholaghala hasi.
Hamalitse kulomba, kawaghendela iwanang'ina wake. Kawapfika wawasa, kwaapfila tsawana usungu.
Kawalongela, “Pfii mbona muwasa? Mlamke mlombe, mleke kwingila mne ukughetsighwa.”
Yesu hang'ali yolonga, kingili lye iwanu litsa aku lyongotsighwa na Yuda, yakalile yumwe mna iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli. Kamghendela Yesu, kamnonela.
Lekeni Yesu kamghutsa, “Yuda, kwomhunduka Imwana we Imunu kwa kumnonela?”
Na wala iwakalile habehi naye hawonile ighatsolawila, walonga, “Mtwatsa, tuwateme na ghamapanga?”
Na yumwe mna wawo kamtowa imtumwa we Mtambika mkulu, kamsepula ghutwi lyake lya kujilo.
Lekeni Yesu kalonga, “Mleke kutenda keli!” Kamkinda ghutwi lyake, kamhonetsa.
Kuya Yesu kawalongela ipfilongotsi we inambiko, iwakulu we iwanu, iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu, ne iwabala iwamtsile yeye, “Pfii mtsa na ghamapanga ne ipfilungu ka nene na mbapfi?
Ghamatsuwa ghose tsanikala na mwemwe mne ing'anda ye Imulungu ng'amnighoghile bae. Lekeni aino iyo isaa yenu, na utawala wa chisi.”
Kuya wamghogha Yesu, waghenda naye mne ing'anda ye Imtambika mkulu. Petiri kamuwinza kwa kutali.
Na hawabwinile ghumoto haghati he chibwalu cha libaratsa, wakala hamwe. Petiri naye kakala nawo.
Na imtumwa yumwe ipinga kamwona Petiri kakala mne ghumwanga. Kamlola ghoya, kalonga, “Imunu yuno naye tsakakala na Yesu!”
Lekeni Petiri kabela, kalonga, “Ghwe ipinga ghwe, nene simmanyile bae.”
Hambele chidogho, imunu yungi kamwona Petiri, naye kalonga, “Ghweghwe naghwe kwa yumwe wawo.” Lekeni Petiri kalonga, “Aka, si nene bae!”
Kuya ibita isaa imwe, imunu yungi kalonga, “Ayu tsakakala naye ghendo, kwaapfila naye Mgalilaya!”
Petiri kalonga, “Ghwe imunu ghwe, chulonga sichimanyile bae!” Baho hang'ali yolonga, jogholo keka.
Imtwatsa kahunduka, kamlola Petiri. Naye Petiri kakumbuka imbuli iyamlongele Imtwatsa, “Leloli jogholo ng'ana yeke ghweghwe kutsonibela mala ndatu, ka ng'unimanyile bae!”
Petiri kalawa kunze, kalila kwa usungu.
Iwanu iwang'ali womkalitsa Yesu wandusa kumbetsa na kumtowa.
Wamtowa aku wamghubika tsinenge, wamghutsa, “Utange! Yuhi yakutowile?”
Kuya walonga mbuli nyingi tsa ukumligha.
Nemitondo haipfikile, iwabala, ipfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso tsawetingana hamwe, wamghala Yesu kune libalatsa lyawo.
Walonga, “Tulongele ka ghweghwe kwa Kiristu.”
na ning'awaghutsa, ng'amtsakwidika.
Lekeni kulawa sambi na kughendelela, Imwana we Imunu katsokala ubali wa kujilo we Imulungu yane Ingupfu.”
Kuya wose wamghutsa, “Apfi ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu?” Naye kawedika, “Mwemwe mwolonga nene iyo yuyo.”
Walonga, “Lelo twobama ukalangama ungi? Twetwe tuwenyegho tuhulika chalongile!”
